Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.util

Class LinkedListRecursive<E>

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.util.LinkedListRecursive<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the generic type of the recursive linked list
public class LinkedListRecursive<E> extends Object
This class is a linkedList that uses only recursive methods to accomplish all non-basic functions This list is able to add at any index, remove at any index, return its size, check if it's empty, check if it contains a given element, set an index to a given element, and remove a given element if it is in the list
Author:
Allie Norton, Austin Bressler, Jeremiah Knizley

      Parameters:
      idx - the index to be added at
      e - the element being added to the list
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if e is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if e is already in the list
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if given index is not within the list

    • set

      public E set(int idx, E e)
      This method changed the element at a given index and returns the element formally at that index
      Parameters:
      idx - the index of the element to be changed
      e - the new element to insert
      Returns:
      E the previous element located at the index
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if e is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if e is already in the list
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if given index is not within the list
